Job Title: Marketing Content Manager (Healthcare)

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Role overview
Ciba Health’s Content Manager is a hybrid role with responsibilities spanning across content strategy, content development, copywriting, design, and editing. This position will require outstanding creative and editorial skills and an entrepreneurial attitude. You will work cross-functionally in a small and talented team to add value to our existing content, as well as create your own with the goal of helping Ciba Health to set an industry-wide presence. This is a unique opportunity to be part of a fast-growing startup making a lasting, positive impact in the health tech sector. This position will be based in the US, but working remotely.
Responsibilities:Manage content production and delivery which includes website updates, sales collateral, email, social media posts, video content, presentations and more. This can include direction, creation, editing, production and distribution. Work cross-functionally with the clinical, business, and product teams to identify data-driven narratives.Create production workflows, and editorial calendars and ensure deadlines are met.Recruit and manage a team of writers, designers, and other creators. Secure and support speaking engagements, guest blog posts, and podcast appearances for our CEO and subject matter experts.Grow and manage Ciba Health's social media presence, engaging with our followers regularly.Develop and nurture relationships with influencers, and other content partners.Develop a strong understanding of our customers and the market and embed this understanding in all marketing content.
ExperienceExperience in content marketing. Bonus if you have experience in Healthcare. A strong point of view for the future of our content strategy and how it maps to our campaigns; experience in building out the business case to pursue it.Copyediting experience with best-in-class standards for editorial quality. In addition, you bring immaculate attention to detail across all of your work.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.Substantial project and team management skills; can drive from insight to ideation to execution, manage multiple projects at once, and re-prioritize as needed.Experience in PR and influencer relations is a plus. Proven experience mapping SEO initiatives.Experience with the following tools: Wordpress CMS, HubSpot, Canva, basic video editing.

Experience Level (if available): None
